name: 蕭郁達
objective:
本課程以化工程序中所包含的製程如蒸餾、熱交換器、攪拌、泵、機械分離等，由質量、能量及動量均衡開始講述，然後探討程序設計時使用的流程圖及其符號、成本估算、管線配置、流體輸送、化工單元規格設計等。
Application of chemical engineering science techniques to design of chemical processes. Comprehensive problems are assigned which include heat, material and economic balances, unit operations and processes, kinetics and thermodynamics.
The major responsibility is placed on individuals or small groups for the optimum design and selection of equipment, and for the calculations of required sizes, plant layout, and cost analyses.
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction to process design
Week 2: Process synthesis
Week 3: Process economics
Week 4: Process optimization
Week 5-6: Heat exchanger network design
Week 7: Distillation process design
Week 8: Water system design
Week 9: Midterm exam
Week 10-11: Simulation software tutorial
Week 12-15: Process simulation workshop
Week 16-18: Final report
scorePolicy:
Participation 10%
Assignments 20%
Midterm Exam 20%
Final Report 50%
materials:
1. R. Smith, “Chemical Process Design and Integration, 2nd Edition”, John Wiley & Sons, Inc., 2016.
2. Self-made materials
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG7：可負擔的潔淨能源（Affordable and Clean Energy）SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）SDG12：負責任的消費與生產（Responsible Consumption and Production）SDG17：夥伴關係（Partnerships for the Goals）
